item.title: Set up the same terminal regardless your OS - and more
item.description: Introduction Throughout my career I have used Windows, Linux, Mac and Windows again, and each year that passes I discover myself using the terminal more and more. Most of my work is done there, except when doing some heavy coding. Therefore I believe it is important to have the same flow no matter which operative system is in use in order not to lose productivity. Back when using Windows, the WSL (Windows Subsystem for Linux) did not exist, and therefore the portability between Unix and Windows was unthinkable.
